snippet.title: They Hunger: Lost Souls 2006 Alpha: Full Playthrough
snippet.description:
https://www.moddb.com/downloads/they-hunger-lost-souls-alpha-and-beta-builds

This is gameplay from the allegedly leaked 2006 build of a cancelled commercial sequel to the old PC Gamer mod "They Hunger" for Half-life, apparently the project was canned in complete silence.

There is 2 builds available, the 2006 build and the 2008 build, both have very noticeable differences, this video shows off the into map for the 2006 version, forgive the use of cheats I just wanted to show off the map some more and not have to deal with the game's unfinished jank.

It appears to be using the Half-Life 2 retail version of source with may of the assets requiring Counter-Strike Source to be mounted to the game, a lot in the 2006 build is obviously placeholder.

Here we have a full playthrough of the available levels, up to a section of level 3 (which fails to load a non-existent section of level 3) and including an heavily unfinished level 4.

The game has an interesting ammo system which shows the player holding what ammunition they have available in the left hand upon equipping the weapon.

The game also however includes that shine of unfinished jank with some of the weapons, the shotgun is inconsistent and the ADS feature is... Not very good to put it lightly, the pan (crowbar) weapon animates very poorly and I would not have been able to tell the effective range had I not played a lot of Half-Life 2.

I'll dig around in the files to see if anything interesting lies within later.

Owen's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyzBsRmywGpEFkmeZcj0Odg
check out liquefied_Synapse on his channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Viper2567
My crappy Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mrthejoshmon
